triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Foundational AI technique used to optimize database performance and automate decision-making in autonomous systems.

triples.name: Predictive analytics
triples.relevance: Statistical technique used to forecast performance issues and optimize query execution plans before they occur.

triples.name: Query optimization
triples.relevance: Core database task that the paper proposes to enhance with deep learning algorithms for predictive query optimization.

triples.name: Database tuning
triples.relevance: Database management task that the paper proposes to automate through AI-driven self-tuning mechanisms and dynamic parameter adjustment.

triples.name: Database index
triples.relevance: Data structure that the paper proposes to optimize intelligently through machine learning-based automatic index selection and maintenance.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Advanced machine learning technique used to enhance query execution plans and improve performance prediction accuracy.

triples.name: Anomaly detection
triples.relevance: Detection technique that the paper proposes to enhance for AI-driven cybersecurity and identifying abnormal database behavior.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning paradigm proposed for real-time database optimization by learning optimal actions through environmental feedback.

triples.name: Quantum computing
triples.relevance: Future technology proposed to accelerate database operations and enable exponentially faster computation for complex queries.

triples.name: Database management system
triples.relevance: Core system the paper proposes to enhance through autonomous, AI-driven mechanisms to reduce administrative overhead and improve reliability.
